attributes.action: proceed with the planned road pricing and vehicle tracking policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the silent majority are getting tired of various self interest groups trying to speak in our name.  Let us therefore stand up and be counted.  Why should this motorist lead group try to influence Government policy which, in the long term, should benefit us all?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
